TopicTitle: Career Mode Request - Tier 0 Probe Core

Articles.Content: Could we please get a stock modification that places some sort of probe core, battery and solar panel in Tier 0? I personally would like to see command pod consume energy and this would address that as well as give players options other than manned-flight right out of the gates.
You might be interested in this suggestion then. If you are, please voice your support.
Solar panels make electricity requirments meaningless, at the moment at least you have to plan for electricity usage untill you get them.
Maybe like 1 ton? For balancing. Similar size to Mk1 too.
I second this. Explorer and Sputnik should have their moment in the career Sun...even if its only for a moment!
